header.title: Preset delivery locations
header.subtitle: These are saved locations customers can pick quickly during onboarding and checkout.

form.title: Add preset location
form.description: Add a preset location with a fee range and optional building choices for customers.
form.buildingsToggle: This preset location has multiple building options
form.buildingsEmpty: Add at least one building name.
form.invalidFeeOrder: Minimum fee cannot exceed maximum fee

list.title: Preset locations for customers
list.subtitle: Customers can choose these saved locations when placing an order.
list.empty: No preset locations yet. Add one to enable quick customer selection.
list.deleteConfirm: Remove this preset location? This action cannot be undone.

edit.title: Edit preset location
edit.description: Update the location name, fee range, or building options.
